MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA6 postcode area of Manley, affecting properties in Manley Lane, Peck Mill Lane and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.26pm. Our emergency response team are onsite assessing the repairs required on a grounded overhead cable and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.10pm on 31st of March 2021.
